title: Parque Central de Quevedo
address: Av. Bolívar y 7 de Octubre, Quevedo
description: An iconic green space where families gather to enjoy cultural events, strolls, and outdoor relaxation.

title: Puente Sur
address: Río Quevedo, southern entrance of the city
description: A modern structure connecting the southern part of the city, offering panoramic river views and local fishing areas.

title: Malecón Eloy Alfaro
address: Av. Eloy Alfaro, riverside of Quevedo River
description: A beautiful tourist boardwalk with walking trails, urban art, and spaces for food and artisan fairs.

title: Technical State University of Quevedo
description: Main higher education institution in the region, offering programs in agricultural, business, and technological sciences.

title: Paseo Shopping Mall
description: A modern shopping center with movie theaters, a food court, and international retail brands.

title: Municipal Market
description: A traditional market to find fresh local produce, clothing, and handmade crafts.

title: 7 de Octubre Stadium
address: Octava Street and June Guzmán Avenue
description: The city's main sports venue, hosting professional football matches and large events.

title: Family Park
description: A family-themed recreational park with green areas, playgrounds, and cultural stages for all ages.
